scripts.reinstall: yarn remove anyline-ocr-react-native-module && yarn add ../../plugin && react-native link
scripts.reinstall-pods: cd ios/ && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock && pod install --verbose && cd .. && react-native link
scripts.bundleAndroid: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.bundleiOS: react-native bundle --entry-file index.ios.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
